questions.question: 2. What is the primary purpose of a GNSS Base Station in land surveying?

answers.a: To move around and collect data points
answers.b: To act as a fixed reference point for accuracy corrections
answers.c: To fly the drone during the survey
answers.d: To capture aerial images of the land

questions.question: 3. Why are Ground Control Points (GCPs) used in a land survey?

answers.b: To assist the drone in landing
answers.c: To improve georeferencing and positional accuracy

questions.question: 4. What equipment is mounted on a tribrach during a land survey?
5. What is the role of a GNSS Rover in a survey?

answers.a: To remain stationary for data correction
answers.c: To collect location data across the survey area
